UserDialog.Title: CryoGenesis
UserDialog.Message: I'm Done on Tatooine! If you are not on your ship right now, get on it and complete 'The Ultimate Warriors'. Next Step is to travel to Alderaan, restart the bot and load up that quest profile on the planet!
